card.name: Aerie Mystics
card.property: Flying {1}{G}{U}: Creatures you control gain shroud until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are cautious with their body language and facial expressions. Any stray movement could betray the positions of the troops they protect and cost many lives.

card.name: Asha's Favor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying, first strike, and vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As his new wings lifted him high above Bant, Taric felt his earthly aspirations transform into heavenly resolve.

card.name: Aven Squire
card.property: Flying Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the meek charge into battle, courage becomes infectious.

card.name: Aven Trailblazer
card.property: Flying Domain — Aven Trailblazer's toughness is equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bird wore the form of a man, bereft of filigree. Why do the Texts not speak of it?" —Belator of Esper

card.name: Celestial Purge
card.property: Exile target black or red permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This new chaos confounds us. We must fling it into our winds, our storms. These we can control." —Bezzit Plar, Esper stormcaller

card.name: Court Homunculus
card.property: Court Homunculus gets +1/+1 as long as you control another artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mages of Esper measure their wealth and status by the number of servants in their retinues.

card.name: Darklit Gargoyle
card.property: Flying {B}: Darklit Gargoyle gets +2/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It shines in the darkness of its master's ambitions.

card.name: Gleam of Resistance
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+2 until end of turn. Untap those creatures. Basic landcycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Lapse of Certainty
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without a connection of mind and body, magic is just an idea stuck in the head, a word on the tip of a tongue.

card.name: Mark of Asylum
card.property: Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A paragon of honor, Galo Aher fell to a blast of fire. The Order of the White Orchid was so saddened that they forged a new sigil in his likeness.

card.name: Martial Coup
card.property: Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. If X is 5 or more, destroy all other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their war forgotten, the nations of Bant stood united in the face of a common threat.

card.name: Mirror-Sigil Sergeant
card.property: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a blue permanent, you may create a token that's a copy of Mirror-Sigil Sergeant.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I had many lives, I would give them all for Bant."

card.name: Nacatl Hunt-Pride
card.property: Vigilance {R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn. {G}, {T}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must hunt and kill the dragon before it can return to raze our ancient city."

card.name: Paragon of the Amesha
card.property: First strike {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Paragon of the Amesha becomes an Angel, gets +3/+3, and gains flying and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let my lance sing with the voices of angels and the heathen cower before my shield, for I will teach this land the meaning of honor."

card.name: Path to Exile
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle their library.

card.name: Rhox Meditant
card.property: When Rhox Meditant enters the battlefield, if you control a green permanent, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The weight of her conviction balances on the harmony of her soul.

card.name: Scepter of Dominance
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whether or not you will bow to me is not open to debate. The question is, will I ever let you rise?" —Fridius, telemin master

card.name: Sigil of the Empty Throne
card.property: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Asha left Bant, she ensured that the world would have protection and order in her absence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the outsiders invaded Bant, soldiers who once saw sigils as the highest marks of glory began to see the scars of battle as tokens of equal worth.

card.name: Wall of Reverence
card.property: Defender, flying At the beginning of your end step, you may gain life equal to the power of target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lives of elves are long, but their memories are longer. Even after death, they do not desert their homes.

card.name: Brackwater Elemental
card.property: When Brackwater Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. Unearth {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Constricting Tendrils
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Priests of Bant protect their temples with traps more elaborate than any mosaic floor.

card.name: Controlled Instincts
card.property: Enchant red or green creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Togk Manytooth struggled helplessly as the kathari circled above him. For a warrior, immobilization is a fate worse than death.

card.name: Cumber Stone
card.property: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The stone is more potent than ever. The flesh that creeps into our land will become even more slovenly and weak." —Niclavs, archmage of Esper

card.name: Esperzoa
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more metal it digests, the more its jelly will fetch on the alchemists' market.

card.name: Ethersworn Adjudicator
card.property: Flying {1}{W}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature or enchantment. {2}{U}: Untap Ethersworn Adjudicator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Esper mages devised their weapons to be so devastating that war seemed unnecessary.

card.name: Faerie Mechanist
card.property: Flying When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Frontline Sage
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The battle was won in the commander's head before the first weapon was drawn.

card.name: Grixis Illusionist
card.property: {T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's simple, really. If they can't find us, they can't kill us."

card.name: Inkwell Leviathan
card.property: Trample Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Into its maw went the seventh sea, never to be seen again while the world remains." —Esper fable

card.name: Master Transmuter
card.property: {U}, {T}, Return an artifact you control to its owner's hand: You may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wasted potential surrounds us. Lend me that bauble, and let me see what it can be made to be."

card.name: Parasitic Strix
card.property: Flying When Parasitic Strix enters the battlefield, if you control a black permanent, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After finding no sustenance on the edges of Grixis, it turned to the skies of Bant.

card.name: Scepter of Insight
card.property: {3} {U}, {T}: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The road to truth has many branches, and so must the cane with which I walk it." —Voln the Elder

card.name: Scornful Aether-Lich
card.property: {W} {B}: Scornful Aether-Lich gains fear and vigilance until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap, and it can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With no flesh, there is no pain, no hesitation, no emotion of any kind. He is crafted perfection." —Tezzeret

card.name: Telemin Performance
card.property: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. That player puts all noncreature cards revealed this way into their graveyard, then you put the creature card onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Traumatic Visions
card.property: Counter target spell. Basic landcycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Unsummon
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Send it back to its own strange world so we can avoid another inglorious combat with these wicked beings." —Captain Valek of Jhess

card.name: View from Above
card.property: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. If you control a white permanent, return View from Above to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This air feels so heavy and thick. There are no winds to speak of. I fear the knowledge that comes from a place like this."

card.name: Worldly Counsel
card.property: Domain — Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every horizon hides a new possibility.

card.name: Absorb Vis
card.property: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life. Basic landcycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Corrupted Roots
card.property: Enchant Forest or Plains Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bones of Jund's dead resurfaced in Naya, poisoning the jungle and killing the sunseeders' crops.

card.name: Drag Down
card.property: Domain — Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The barbarians of Jund believe the bottomless tar pits extend forever into other, darker worlds.

card.name: Dreadwing

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dreadwings spring from lofty perches to surprise kathari in midflight. They smother their prey and then consume it as they glide gently toward the ground.

card.name: Extractor Demon
card.property: Flying Whenever another creature leaves the battlefield, you may have target player put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard. Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Fleshformer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Necromancers who discovered the new sources of mana were quick to dream up new nightmares with them.

card.name: Grixis Slavedriver
card.property: When Grixis Slavedriver leaves the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Infectious Horror
card.property: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not once in the history of Grixis has anyone died of old age.

card.name: Kederekt Parasite
card.property: Whenever an opponent draws a card, if you control a red permanent, you may have Kederekt Parasite deal 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the smell of passing thoughts piques its hunger, its maw becomes primed with acid and a taste for brains.

card.name: Nyxathid
card.property: As Nyxathid enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Nyxathid gets -1/-1 for each card in the chosen player's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Born of volcanic forces, it thrives on the absolute panic it inspires.

card.name: Pestilent Kathari
card.property: Flying Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) {2}{R}: Pestilent Kathari gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Rotting Rats
card.property: When Rotting Rats enters the battlefield, each player discards a card. Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Salvage Slasher
card.property: Salvage Slasher gets +1/+0 for each artifact card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Esper artificers never imagined that one day their scraps would be pressed against their soft and fragile throats.

card.name: Scepter of Fugue
card.property: {1} {B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One goes to Tidehollow either to forget or to be forgotten. Either way, the scullers will oblige.

card.name: Sedraxis Alchemist
card.property: When Sedraxis Alchemist enters the battlefield, if you control a blue permanent, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The problem with a liquid that can dissolve anything is finding something to carry it in.

card.name: Voices from the Void
card.property: Domain — Target player discards a card for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Grixis collided with the rest of Alara, the worlds began to hear the hateful whispers of the forgotten dead.

card.name: Wretched Banquet
card.property: Destroy target creature if it has the least power or is tied for least power among creatures on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The meek inherit nothing." —Sedris, the Traitor King

card.name: Yoke of the Damned
card.property: Enchant creature When a creature dies, destroy enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The demon's yoke is part leash, part noose.

card.name: Banefire
card.property: Banefire deals X damage to any target. If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For Sarkhan Vol, the dragon is the purest expression of life's savage splendor.

card.name: Bloodhall Ooze
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black permanent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodhall Ooze. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green permanent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodhall Ooze.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A drop of blood spilled from the first dragon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Jund, the deep canyons were the best places to hide. When the goblins wandered into Naya, they found that was not so true.

card.name: Dark Temper
card.property: Dark Temper deals 2 damage to target creature. If you control a black permanent, destroy the creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you've got the temperament of a dragon, every argument is one you'll win.

card.name: Dragonsoul Knight
card.property: First strike {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Dragonsoul Knight becomes a Dragon, gets +5/+3, and gains flying and trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The farther he roamed from Jund and its dragons, the more he felt their essence in himself.

card.name: Fiery Fall
card.property: Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature. Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Goblin Razerunners

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Finding themselves in a new and unexplored world, they immediately set it on fire.

card.name: Hellspark Elemental
card.property: Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Hellspark Elemental. Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ignite Disorder
card.property: Ignite Disorder deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target white and/or blue creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bant is a world imprisoned by polished stone and tyrannical rule. It yearns to strike back against those who restrain it."

card.name: Kranioceros
card.property: {1} {W}: Kranioceros gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A surly beast, the kranioceros will raise its defenses at the smallest threat. Stay out of sight and downwind, or you'll disrupt its natural migrations." —Ebrel, godtoucher mentor

card.name: Maniacal Rage
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spikes of sangrite made the goblin stronger, but they didn't make him any smarter.

card.name: Molten Frame
card.property: Destroy target artifact creature. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The metal filigree in his body glowed red-hot, and his flesh soon followed.

card.name: Quenchable Fire
card.property: Quenchable Fire deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. It deals an additional 3 damage to that player or planeswalker at the beginning of your next upkeep step unless that player or that planeswalker's controller pays {U} before that step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You'd better know how to pray for rain.

card.name: Rakka Mar
card.property: Haste {R}, {T}: Create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The finest pawns are those with pawns of their own." —Nicol Bolas

card.name: Toxic Iguanar
card.property: Toxic Iguanar has deathtouch as long as you control a green permanent. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are no "weak" creatures on Jund. Even the smallest can strike a deadly blow.

card.name: Viashino Slaughtermaster
card.property: Double strike {B}{G}: Viashino Slaughtermaster gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll fight two at once, and then lick their guts from my blades."

card.name: Volcanic Fallout
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Volcanic Fallout deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How can we outrun the sky?" —Hadran, sunseeder of Naya

card.name: Voracious Dragon
card.property: Flying Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.) When Voracious Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals damage to any target equal to twice the number of Goblins it devoured.

card.name: Wandering Goblins
card.property: Domain — {3}: Wandering Goblins gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tired of waiting for a dragon to eat them, some hardy goblins struck out to become meals for the unknown.

card.name: Worldheart Phoenix
card.property: Flying You may cast Worldheart Phoenix from your graveyard by paying {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than paying its mana cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Beacon Behemoth
card.property: {1}: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When its smoky plumes light Naya's sky, every creature from the smallest pip fawn to the largest rannet heeds the warning.

card.name: Cliffrunner Behemoth
card.property: Cliffrunner Behemoth has haste as long as you control a red permanent. Cliffrunner Behemoth has lifelink as long as you control a white permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's revered for its power, celebrated for its grace, and feared for the avalanches triggered by its thunderous feet.

card.name: Cylian Sunsinger

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sun shines bright upon the strong."

card.name: Ember Weaver
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) As long as you control a red permanent, Ember Weaver gets +1/+0 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each night, the sun unravels and blows away. Each day, the spiders set a new one in the sky." —Sunseeder myth

card.name: Filigree Fracture
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If that permanent was blue or black, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sphinx tyrannized Bant until a rhox mage tested the hardiness of her shiny parts.

card.name: Gluttonous Slime
card.property: Flash Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Jund, everything eventually ends up in something else's stomach.

card.name: Matca Rioters
card.property: Domain — Matca Rioters's power and toughness are each equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When outsiders interrupted the matca championship, things got ugly.

card.name: Might of Alara
card.property: Domain — Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The combined strength of all five planes spawned creations none had seen before.

card.name: Nacatl Savage
card.property: Protection from artifacts

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blades dull and armor dents. Marisi taught us that instinct is the only thing a true warrior needs." —Ajani

card.name: Noble Hierarch
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She protects the sacred groves from blight, drought, and the Unbeholden.

card.name: Paleoloth
card.property: Whenever another creature with power 5 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gods do not sleep soundly in the earth's embrace." —Mayael the Anima

card.name: Sacellum Archers
card.property: {R} {W}, {T}: Sacellum Archers deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our arrows are aimed not at the sacred behemoths but at those who dare to dream of such a trophy."

card.name: Scattershot Archer
card.property: {T}: Scattershot Archer deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To train her elves for war, Mayael would drop a sackful of acorns from the tree canopy. Each archer tried to split as many as possible before the acorns hit the forest floor below.

card.name: Shard Convergence
card.property: Search your library for a Plains card, an Island card, a Swamp card, and a Mountain card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Soul's Majesty
card.property: Draw cards equal to the power of target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An avatar he sculpts of wisdom and strength.

card.name: Spore Burst
card.property: Domain — Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seeds from Jund don't drift gently on the wind. They get up and stampede.

card.name: Sylvan Bounty
card.property: Target player gains 8 life. Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some who scouted new lands chose to stay.

card.name: Thornling
card.property: {G}: Thornling gains haste until end of turn. {G}: Thornling gains trample until end of turn. {G}: Thornling gains indestructible until end of turn. {1}: Thornling gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}: Thornling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Tukatongue Thallid
card.property: When Tukatongue Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jund's thallids tried to disguise their deliciousness by covering themselves in spines harvested from the tukatongue tree.

card.name: Wild Leotau
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Wild Leotau unless you pay {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Leotau that were born wild make the best mounts. It's like riding a thunderstorm." —Rafiq of the Many

card.name: Apocalypse Hydra
card.property: Apocalypse Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, it enters the battlefield with an additional X +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Apocalypse Hydra: It deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Blood Tyrant
card.property: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, each player loses 1 life. Put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Tyrant for each 1 life lost this way. Whenever a player loses the game, put five +1/+1 counters on Blood Tyrant.

card.name: Charnelhoard Wurm
card.property: Trample Whenever Charnelhoard Wurm deals damage to an opponent, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jund's dragons hoard only sangrite crystals. Its wurms aren't so picky.

card.name: Child of Alara

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Trample When Child of Alara dies, destroy all nonland permanents. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The progeny of the Maelstrom shows no allegiance—and no mercy—to any of the five shards.

card.name: Conflux

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Search your library for a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and a green card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After years of world-bending machinations, Bolas's triumph is at hand.

card.name: Countersquall
card.property: Counter target noncreature spell. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each of the twenty-three winds of Esper is named and chronicled, and every possible interaction with the flow of magic is exhaustively detailed.

card.name: Elder Mastery
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has flying. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, that player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Taste his power, hunger for his command.

card.name: Esper Cormorants
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The smiths of this land must be mad to reach so far and so high for another creature to decorate." —Cagen Vargan, Jhessian sea scout

card.name: Exploding Borders
card.property: Domain — Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Exploding Borders deals X damage to target player or planeswalker, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Reuniting a world is not a gentle process.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the shards merged into the Maelstrom, their mana energies fused into new monstrosities.

card.name: Giltspire Avenger
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {T}: Destroy target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To trespass so far from home is to ask for a lonesome grave."

card.name: Goblin Outlander
card.property: Protection from white

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Egbol stared in wonder at Naya's landscape. So much to eat. So much to steal.

card.name: Gwafa Hazid, Profiteer
Hellkite Hatchling
card.property: Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.) Hellkite Hatchling has flying and trample if it devoured a creature.

card.name: Jhessian Balmgiver
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have two choices: heed my advice now or need my healing later."

card.name: Knight of the Reliquary
card.property: Knight of the Reliquary gets +1/+1 for each land card in your graveyard. {T}, Sacrifice a Forest or Plains: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Knowledge of Bant's landscape and ruins is a weapon that the invaders can't comprehend." —Elspeth

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves of Naya were the last to acknowledge the massive shift of mana in their world.

card.name: Maelstrom Archangel

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Flying Whenever Maelstrom Archangel deals combat damage to a player, you may cast a nonland card from your hand without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no world where angels fear to tread.

card.name: Magister Sphinx
card.property: Flying When Magister Sphinx enters the battlefield, target player's life total becomes 10.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These benighted worlds are thick with ignorance. I will educate them. They will listen, or they will die."

card.name: Malfegor
card.property: Flying When Malfegor enters the battlefield, discard your hand. Each opponent sacrifices a creature for each card discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A demon cannot be trusted, and a dragon will not be ruled.

card.name: Meglonoth
card.property: Vigilance, trample Whenever Meglonoth blocks a creature, Meglonoth deals damage to that creature's controller equal to Meglonoth's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the shards merged, Mayael found herself the general of Naya's mightiest army.

card.name: Nacatl Outlander
card.property: Protection from blue

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Survival in the wilds of Naya left Tiyan well equipped to win the civilized battles of Bant.

card.name: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker
card.property: +3: Destroy target noncreature permanent. −2: Gain control of target creature. −9: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker deals 7 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards seven cards, then sacrifices seven permanents.

card.name: Progenitus

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Protection from everything If Progenitus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Progenitus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Soul of the World has returned.

card.name: Rhox Bodyguard
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Rhox Bodyguard enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An enlightened soul caged in a body made for battle.

card.name: Scarland Thrinax
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Scarland Thrinax.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is only one way of life in Jund: feed on the weak until you are cut down by something stronger." —Jorshu of Clan Nel Toth

card.name: Shambling Remains
card.property: Shambling Remains can't block. Unearth {B}{R} ({B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Skyward Eye Prophets
card.property: Vigilance {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They lament the doom that is coming to Bant without realizing the part their own leaders have played in it.

card.name: Sludge Strider
card.property: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control or another artifact you control leaves the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Underneath the cities of Esper are cycles of life unseen by those who feed them.

card.name: Sphinx Summoner
card.property: Flying When Sphinx Summoner enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Suicidal Charge
card.property: Sacrifice Suicidal Charge: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn. Those creatures attack this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They think they're winning. But they're just lining up to be dinner." —Rakka Mar

card.name: Vagrant Plowbeasts
card.property: {1}: Regenerate target creature with power 5 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Plowbeasts of Naya escaped their harnesses in droves, content to snack on the conveniently cultivated fields of Eos and Valeron.

card.name: Valeron Outlander
card.property: Protection from black

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After years of honing her philosophy in debate with stubborn rhoxes, Niella was ready to convert any heathen.

card.name: Vectis Agents
card.property: {U} {B}: Vectis Agents gets -2/-0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With their life energy suppressed under their etherium enhancements, thieves from Esper found it surprisingly easy to explore the ruins of Grixis.

card.name: Vedalken Outlander
card.property: Protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Seekers of Carmot searched across the unknown lands for the mystical red stone that could reforge Esper in ethereal perfection.

card.name: Zombie Outlander
card.property: Protection from green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ripe smell of life drifted into Grixis. The dead caught the scent and with reckless hunger followed it back into Jund.

card.name: Armillary Sphere
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages—until now.

card.name: Bone Saw
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+0. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a world where death is always violent, cruel weapons are as common as rocks.

card.name: Font of Mythos
card.property: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws two additional cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who drink from Malfegor's cup are tainted with hunger and stained with lies.

card.name: Kaleidostone
card.property: When Kaleidostone enters the battlefield, draw a card. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Kaleidostone: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once broken, who knows what worlds might grow from its shards?

card.name: Mana Cylix
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who dismiss the cylix as an ordinary wooden bowl are blind to the true measure of its worth.

card.name: Manaforce Mace
card.property: Domain — Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the shards merged, relics once thought mundane regained forgotten powers.

card.name: Obelisk of Alara
card.property: {1} {W}, {T}: You gain 5 life. {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {1}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. {1}{R}, {T}: Obelisk of Alara deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Ancient Ziggurat
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Built in honor of Alara's creatures, the ziggurat vanished long ago. When Progenitus awakened, the temple emerged again.

card.name: Exotic Orchard
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them." —Pulan, Bant orchardist

card.name: Reliquary Tower
card.property: You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the aven scouts located the tower in Esper, the Knights of the Reliquary set off on a righteous crusade to recover their lost treasures.

card.name: Rupture Spire
card.property: Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped. When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Unstable Frontier
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblins went to sleep in Jund and awoke in Grixis. They'd never seen a zombie before. They would never see one again.
